title: TCG Shop: Cards, Toys and Comics
description: TCG Shop: Cards, Toys and Comics is a casual simulation game where you run a fan-fueled store packed with collectibles, comics, and TCG cards. Manage shelves, handle sales, deliver orders, and grow your business into a geek paradise. Unlock upgrades, hire staff, and strategize your way to becoming a legendary merchant in this blend of tycoon, clicker, and management gameplay.
